# Pull Request Template

Short, focused PR template to help reviewers. Keep PRs minimal and specific to the assignment.

- **Title:** Short descriptive title (e.g. "Add OpenMP main")
- **Description:** One-paragraph summary of the change and why it was necessary.
- **Changes:** List of files or features added/modified.
- **Build & Test:** How to build and a short test instruction (e.g. `make openmp` and run `bin/openmp`).
- **Checklist:**
  - [ ] Compiles locally
  - [ ] Basic correctness verified against serial
  - [ ] README updated if necessary

Keep PRs small and focused on the assignment scope.
